scripts.test: npm run db:schema:test && npm run db:migrate:test && echo '=== db ready ===' && cross-env NODE_ENV=test DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest --runInBand
scripts.test:watch: npm run db:schema:test && npm run db:migrate:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest --watch
scripts.test:cov: npm run db:schema:test && npm run db:migrate:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.test NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest --coverage
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'for f in sql/migrations/*.sql; do [ -e "$f" ] && psql "${DB_URL:-$DATABASE_URL}" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f "$f"; done; for f in migrations/*.sql; do [ -e "$f" ] && psql "${DB_URL:-$DATABASE_URL}" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f "$f"; done; true'
scripts.db:migrate:test: dotenv -e .env.test -- sh -c 'for f in sql/migrations/*.sql; do [ -e "$f" ] && psql "${DB_URL:-$DATABASE_URL}" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f "$f"; done; for f in migrations/*.sql; do [ -e "$f" ] && psql "${DB_URL:-$DATABASE_URL}" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f "$f"; done; true'
